tool_description: Verifies if a student has completed all prerequisite and co-requisite courses required for enrollment in specified courses.

target_courses.description: Array of course codes to check prerequisites for

completed_courses.description: Array of previously completed course codes

completed_grades.description: Array of grades for completed courses (A, B, C, D, F)

enrollment_term.description: Term for intended enrollment (Fall YYYY, Spring YYYY, Summer YYYY)

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: completed_courses and completed_grades arrays must have the same length.
Invalid grade format: Grades must be one of [A, A-, B+, B, B-, C+, C, C-, D+, D, D-, F].
Student not found: The provided student_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid enrollment term: Term must be in format 'Fall YYYY', 'Spring YYYY', or 'Summer YYYY'.
Course prerequisite data unavailable: Unable to retrieve prerequisite information for one or more target courses.
usage: Provide student_id, target courses for enrollment, completed courses with grades, and intended enrollment term. The tool will check if all prerequisites are satisfied.

overall_eligibility.description: Whether the student is eligible for all requested courses

eligible_courses.description: Array of courses the student is eligible to enroll in

ineligible_courses.description: Array of courses the student cannot enroll in due to unmet prerequisites

missing_prerequisites.description: Array of prerequisite courses that need to be completed
